summary: This mod is a medium sized player house with enough space for more than 10 companions. It's located near Dawnstar and uses a few custom vanilla based meshes so you don't need any textures.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][img]http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-trPNxZ4NDgQ/UqH6sFUBbLI/AAAAAAAAEic/M39NYIudwKg/s1600/deer2.png[/img][/size]
[size=6]                            Deerhearth Lodge[/size]
[size=3][b] Description: [/b]
 A medium sized player house with enough space for more than 10+ followers. Safe storages and few custom vanilla based  meshes. The House is located near Dawnstar. Idle markers for your follower included (May require AFT or any mod to set  follower hangout area) A few hunters are settled outside the lodge.

 [b]Lore: 
[/b] Some say that the house was built by a giant and some say that the house was built by a strong human. After finding the  lodge you can see a few hunters settled next to it. A pink leafed trees grow next to it, Hunters say they grown there  themselves after four arrows pierced into the ground where they grow. Upon coming to doors, you find a letter telling only  one: "Greetings,". It seems like the text should continue there but it doesn't.

 [b]How to get inside: 
[/b] You can find a key in the stump next to carriage. If you can't find it there its most likely by your load order. You can give the  key to yourselves by console. Type in "help Deerhearth 0" and then press PgUp untill you find Key to Deerharth Lodge. Then  type in "player.additem xxxxxxx" and replace the "xxxxxxx" with ID next to the Key name.

 [b]Compatibility:[/b]
 It's compatible with everything except of mods that use the same location.
 
[/size]
author: zexyzek
